Vol.:(0123456789)
Correction: Revolutionizing pediatric neuroimaging: the era of CT, MRI, and beyond
Maura E. Ryan1,2  · Alok Jaju1,2
Published online: 22 August 2023 © The Author(s), under exclusive licence to Springer-Verlag GmbH Germany, part of Springer Nature 2023
Correction: Child's Nervous System (2023) https://doi.org/10.1007/s00381-023-06041-9
In this article the caption to Fig. 2: a) an “l” was omitted from the name of the physician contributing the image  (Eric J. Russell), b) “leptomeningeal metastasis” should be “mycotic aneurysms”.
The original article has been corrected.
Publisher's Note Springer Nature remains neutral with regard to jurisdictional claims in published maps and institutional affiliations.
The original article can be found online at https:// doi. org/ 10. 1007/ s00381- 023- 06041-9.
* Maura E. Ryan mryan@luriechildrens.org
1 Department of Medical Imaging, Ann and Robert H. Lurie Children’s Hospital of Chicago, 225 East Chicago Ave, Chicago, IL, USA 2 Northwestern University Feinberg School of Medicine, 420 East Superior St, Chicago, IL, USA

title: Correction: Revolutionizing pediatric neuroimaging: the era of CT, MRI, and beyond
